reviewText: I bought this for my wife because she traveled to Russia a few times and missed Moscow.  So I was really looking forward to popping this in the dvd player.  I learned a lot about the history of Moscow.  Only problem is the video is from 1997.  I wish I was joking.  The audio leaves a lot to be desired.  So if you want to learn about Moscow to travel there this movie will fit the bill, just don't expect modern video.
